videos.title: ZOO (2020)
videos.description: "Zoo," directed by Will Niava, is a short film from 2020. It depicts an encounter between three misfits and a troubled man that takes an unexpected turn. The film is noted for its striking visual storytelling and intense narrative, highlighting the complexities of social interactions and unforeseen consequences from seemingly ordinary encounters.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: Face (2021)
videos.additional_info:
Face (2021)
The 2021 trailer for Jessica Helfand's book FACE, directed by Lake Buckley and Dayday, was produced for its release by MIT Press. The production team behind the trailer included Nicolas Thau as the producer, Harry Walters as the production manager, and Charlotte Arnoux handling casting. Mayer Chalom was the director of photography, with Davide Sorasio and Emma Penrose assisting as 1st and 2nd AC respectively.
Technique - Shadow Box
Director - dayday, Lake Buckley
DOP - Mayer Chalom
Editor - Mah Ferraz
Colorist - Carlos Flores
Original Source - Link
BOOK

videos.title: The Dare - Perfume (2024)
videos.description: The "The Dare - Perfume 2024" commercial is an evocative and visually striking advertisement that captures the essence of boldness and sensuality. It features a series of elegantly choreographed scenes where the protagonist moves through various luxurious settings, exuding confidence and allure. The commercial employs a rich color palette and dramatic lighting to highlight the sophistication and intensity of the perfume. The narrative is punctuated by close-up shots of the perfume bottle, emphasizing its sleek design and the brand's logo, leaving a lasting impression of elegance and daring on the viewer.
videos.additional_info:
The Dare - Perfume (2024)

videos.alt_text: "The Fear Cycle" Film - Unveiling Sleep Paralysis Through Art
videos.title: "The Fear Cycle" Film - Unveiling Sleep Paralysis Through Art (2024)
videos.description: "The Fear Cycle" film explores Nicolas Bruno’s experiences with Sleep Paralysis, a sleep disorder that causes vivid nightmares. Bruno transforms his fears into artwork, giving viewers a glimpse into each dream sequence. This film delves into Bruno's creative journey, showcasing his artistic process, dream journal entries, and theatrical renditions of his visions.
videos.additional_info:
"The Fear Cycle" Film - Unveiling Sleep Paralysis Through Art (2024)
"The Fear Cycle" film explores Nicolas Bruno’s experiences with Sleep Paralysis, a sleep disorder that causes vivid nightmares. Bruno transforms his fears into artwork, giving viewers a glimpse into each dream sequence. This film delves into Bruno's creative journey, showcasing his artistic process, dream journal entries, and theatrical renditions of his visions.
Technique - Shadow Box
Director - Dexter Brierley, Matthew Seger
Editor - Armen Harootun
Colorist - Connor Bailey
Original Source - Link

PAINTING

videos.title: Donna Missal - Sex is Good (2021)
videos.description: The 2021 music video for Donna Missal's song "sex is good (but have you tried)" features a vibrant, expressive setting where various scenes of intimacy and personal freedom are intertwined. The video's aesthetic is raw and artsy, focusing on personal connections and the emotional depth of relationships. It mixes dance sequences with candid, close-up shots of individuals and couples, emphasizing the song's themes of intimacy beyond physicality.
videos.additional_info:
Donna Missal - Sex is Good (2021)
The 2021 music video for Donna Missal's song "sex is good (but have you tried)" features a vibrant, expressive setting where various scenes of intimacy and personal freedom are intertwined. The video's aesthetic is raw and artsy, focusing on personal connections and the emotional depth of relationships. It mixes dance sequences with candid, close-up shots of individuals and couples, emphasizing the song's themes of intimacy beyond physicality.
Technique - Shadow Box
Director - Rodrigo Inada
DOP - Julia Pitch
Original Source - Link

videos.title: The Perfectionist (Short Film) (2015)
videos.description: "The Perfectionist" was originally designed and produced for screening on three independent monitors. The resulting multi-screen installation offers the audience not only an impressive panorama but also an expanded view of the action. It is less about the simultaneous presentation of different perspectives, but more about staging of interaction and the overall picture of all three monitors.
videos.additional_info:
The Perfectionist (Short Film) (2015)
"The Perfectionist" was originally designed and produced for screening on three independent monitors. The resulting multi-screen installation offers the audience not only an impressive panorama but also an expanded view of the action. It is less about the simultaneous presentation of different perspectives, but more about staging of interaction and the overall picture of all three monitors.
Technique - Shadow Box , Split Screen
Director - Laura Pfister
DOP - Julian Misiorny
Original Source - Link

videos.title: A$AP Ferg - Floor Seats (2019)
videos.description: In the music video for "Floor Seats," A$AP Ferg gives a supposedly VIP tour of New York City on his Redline BMX, showcasing the rare and unique experience of his life—complete with gravity-defying bike tricks and a closing act of a house party that makes Harlem look like the ultimate VIP lounge. Because nothing says VIP like riding a BMX through the streets and ending the night with a raucous house bash, right?
videos.additional_info:
